title: GD: "We want to be able to moderate our boards! We've got our own culture!"
body:
*After years, a few regulars are picked by mods to please our demands

*New mods attempt to prove they're up for the task, moderate the boards 

GD: "Waaaah the mods picked nazis to moderate us!!! Remove them!!"

Now now. I know the issue got solved. I know that in the end, y'all got what you wanted.
But geez people. I'm not saying you shouldn't tell them when they've made mistakes, but you don't have to be dicks to your friends because they fucked up on their first day...
